history.proof: qsimpl use: PreOrder. constructor. - unfold Reflexive. intros. qsimpl use: incl_nil,PreOrder. - unfold Transitive. intros. qsimpl use: incl_nil,PreOrder,incl_app. srun best use: incl_tran.

exceptions.exn: Cannot turn inductive PreOrder into an evaluable reference.
In environment X : Type X0 : relation X -> Prop x : list X a : ?M1844 Unable to unify "a el []" with "a el x".

In environment X : Type X0 : relation X -> Prop x, y, z : list X H : x <<= y H0 : y <<= z a : ?M1851 Unable to unify "(fix In (a : ?M1851) (l : list ?M1851) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) a (?M1852 ++ ?M1853)" with "(fix In (a : X) (l : list X) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) a x".

original: intros X. unfold PreOrder. constructor. - unfold Reflexive. intros. apply incl_nil. - unfold Transitive. intros. apply incl_app; auto.
